author: Jeremy Alters, Matthew Moore, Vinh Vuong
title: Alters, Moore & Vuong: Coronavirus fallout – hold China accountable for virus failures
description: Even in times of global crisis, China staunchly refuses to cooperate with the rest of the world.
content:
Programming alert: Watch the authors discuss this topic and more on "The Story with Martha MacCallum" on April 8 at 7 pm EDT on Fox News Channel.
When America rang in 2020, it was with the hopes of a new decade and new beginnings. Few would have imagined tha… [+7553 chars]
